workflow.name: Automated sales proposal & summary generator using GPT-4o, Sheets, Drive & Gmail
workflow.description:
## üìò Description:
This workflow automates the creation, storage, and reporting of personalized sales collateral for booked leads using GPT-4o, Google Sheets, Google Drive, and Gmail.
It pulls leads from a central sheet, filters booked ones, generates AI-written sales materials (summary, one-pager, and proposal), uploads the output to Drive, updates the sheet with proposal links, and emails a consolidated HTML summary to the marketing inbox.
It serves as a full-cycle AI-powered outreach content generator that transforms structured lead data into ready-to-use collateral in minutes.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

‚ñ∂Ô∏è When Clicking ‚ÄòExecute Workflow‚Äô (Manual Trigger)
 Starts the automation manually, fetching the latest lead records for batch processing.

üìä Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets
 Pulls all lead details (company name, contact, email, booking status, etc.) from the outreach automation sheet used as the CRM base.

üß© Validate Lead Data Payload
 Checks each row for a valid email format.
 ‚úÖ Valid entries proceed to booking filter.
 ‚ùå Invalid ones are logged to an error sheet.

‚ö†Ô∏è Log Invalid Leads to Google Sheets
 Stores incomplete or malformed lead data in a separate tab for cleanup without interrupting execution.

üéØ Filter for Booked Leads
 Isolates leads marked as BOOKED‚Äîthe confirmed clients eligible for personalized collateral generation.

‚öôÔ∏è Configure GPT-4o Model (Azure OpenAI)
 Initializes the GPT-4o model to generate tailored text content based on lead data (company, title, industry, etc.).

üß† Generate Sales Collateral (AI)
 Uses GPT-4o to produce three structured assets per lead:
 1Ô∏è‚É£ Sales Summary ‚Äî a concise 80-word follow-up note.
 2Ô∏è‚É£ One-Pager ‚Äî headline + three selling points + CTA.
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Proposal Draft ‚Äî introduction, scope, timeline, and next steps.
 All outputs returned as structured JSON for parsing.

üßπ Parse AI JSON Output
 Cleans and normalizes GPT-4o responses, ensuring JSON integrity and consistency across all generated materials.

üìÑ Convert Collateral into Text Reports
 Compiles each lead‚Äôs collateral into a .txt report containing all three sections.
 Formatting uses clean dividers and labeled blocks for readability.

‚òÅÔ∏è Upload Sales Collateral to Google Drive
 Uploads each generated file to the collatral data Drive folder.
 Returns both view and download links for each report.

üîó Map Uploaded Files with Lead Data
 Cross-references uploaded files with corresponding leads using index mapping.
 Prepares structured data with Email, ProposalLink, and timestamps.

‚úÖ Update Lead Record with Proposal Link
 Updates the source Google Sheet, attaching each lead‚Äôs proposal link for traceability and internal access.

üóÇÔ∏è Aggregate Uploaded File Metadata
 Compiles an HTML-formatted list of uploaded reports (file names and links).
 Calculates total processed leads for the summary section.

‚úâÔ∏è Generate Sales Summary Email (AI)
 Uses GPT-4o to create a clean HTML report section containing:
Total booked leads processed
Linked list of uploaded files
Short insights paragraph summarizing sales activity

üìß Send Sales Summary Email via Gmail
 Delivers the HTML report to the internal inbox (e.g., newscctv22@gmail.com) with subject ‚ÄúSales Collateral Summary.‚Äù
 The email is formatted for Gmail/Outlook rendering and ready for forwarding to management.

## üß© Prerequisites
Google Sheets and Drive OAuth setup (Techdome account)
Azure OpenAI GPT-4o credentials
Gmail integration for report delivery

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual collateral drafting for booked leads
 ‚úÖ Auto-updates CRM sheets with proposal links
 ‚úÖ Generates consistent, professional B2B materials in real time
 ‚úÖ Provides an instant HTML summary for daily or weekly reporting
 ‚úÖ Ensures full traceability of every proposal created

## üë• Perfect For
- B2B marketing and pre-sales teams
- Agencies managing client acquisition pipelines
- Business development operations using Google Sheets as CRM
- Teams seeking AI-driven, hands-off collateral generation and reporting

workflow.name: Automated Sales Proposal & Summary Generator using GPT-4o, Sheets & Drive

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI sales assistant that creates short, friendly, and professional B2B sales materials. 
Your task is to generate:
1. A short Sales Summary (for email follow-up),
2. A One-Pager (pitch overview),
3. A Proposal Draft (detailed offer).

Each output must be relevant to the lead‚Äôs company, job title, and industry. 
Keep tone professional and persuasive. 
Output everything in JSON format with three fields: "summary", "one_pager", and "proposal".

nodes.name: Upload Sales Collateral to Google Drive
Map Uploaded Files with Lead Data
Update Lead Record with Proposal Link

parameters.text:
=You are an expert sales reporting assistant. Based on the uploaded lead reports below, write a short **HTML-formatted** sales summary email section. Input Details: - Total Booked Leads: {{ $json["totalLeads"] || "0" }} - Uploaded Files: {{ $json["fileListText"] || "No uploaded file data available" }} Instructions: 1. Write the message in **HTML format**. 2. Include: - A title section (e.g., üìä Sales Report Summary) - A line showing total leads - A bullet list with file names and links - A short ‚ÄúSales Insights‚Äù paragraph (2‚Äì4 sentences) based on the leads. 3. Use professional formatting (e.g.,

,
    ,

    tags). 4. Do not include or ‚Äî only return the inner HTML section. 5. Keep tone: short, friendly, and analytical.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI assistant that generates professional HTML snippets for automated sales reports.  
Always return clean, valid HTML ‚Äî no markdown, no JSON ‚Äî just formatted HTML ready to embed in an email body.

nodes.name: Send Sales Summary Email via Gmail

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Automated Sales Proposal & Summary Generator using GPT-4o, Sheets & Drive
Automatically generates personalized **Sales Collateral** (Summary, One-Pager, and Proposal) for each booked lead using GPT-4o.  
Uploads materials to Google Drive, updates lead records in Sheets, and sends a professional HTML summary email report.

### üîπ Workflow Highlights
1Ô∏è‚É£ Fetch booked leads from Google Sheets  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Validate data and skip invalid entries  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Generate 3 AI-based materials (Summary, One-Pager, Proposal)  
4Ô∏è‚É£ Convert AI output to formatted text files  
5Ô∏è‚É£ Upload collateral to Google Drive  
6Ô∏è‚É£ Map Drive links to corresponding leads in Google Sheets  
7Ô∏è‚É£ Generate HTML Sales Summary Report  
8Ô∏è‚É£ Send report to the marketing/sales inbox  

### üîπ Tools Used
- Google Sheets ‚Üí Lead database  
- GPT-4o (Azure OpenAI) ‚Üí Collateral generation & summary writing  
- Google Drive ‚Üí Document storage  
- Gmail ‚Üí Email delivery  
- JavaScript ‚Üí Parsing & file conversion

## üßæ Retrieve Lead Records from Google Sheets  
Fetches lead data (Company Name, Email, Booking Status, etc.) from the  sheet.  
Acts as the workflow‚Äôs entry point.

## üß© Validate Lead Data Payload  
Checks if lead records have a valid email address.  
‚úÖ Valid ‚Üí Sent for further processing  
‚ùå Invalid ‚Üí Logged in the ‚ÄúInvalid Leads‚Äù sheet.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Log Invalid Leads to Google Sheets  
Stores any malformed or missing lead entries for later cleanup.  
Prevents workflow interruption due to bad data.

## üéØ Filter for Booked Leads  
Filters only leads marked as ‚ÄúBOOKED‚Äù.  
Ensures collateral generation only runs for confirmed clients.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configure GPT-4o Model  
Connects Azure OpenAI GPT-4o for downstream nodes.  
Used for both sales collateral and HTML summary generation.

## üß† Generate Sales Collateral (AI)  
GPT-4o generates 3 structured outputs per booked lead:
1. **Sales Summary** ‚Äî short overview  
2. **One-Pager** ‚Äî headline + 3 bullet points + CTA  
3. **Proposal Draft** ‚Äî intro, scope, timeline, and next steps  
All returned as structured JSON.

## üßπ Parse AI JSON Output  
Cleans and parses the GPT-4o output into usable JSON keys:  
- `summary`  
- `one_pager`  
- `proposal`  
Handles invalid or raw responses safely.

## üìÑ Convert Collateral into Text Reports  
Converts parsed AI output into `.txt` files using Node.js Buffer.  
Each report contains Summary, One-Pager, and Proposal sections, formatted for readability.

## ‚òÅÔ∏è Upload Sales Collateral to Google Drive  
Uploads each generated `.txt` collateral file to the ‚Äúcollatral data‚Äù folder.  
Returns Google Drive view & download links for each file.

## üóÇÔ∏è Aggregate Uploaded File Metadata  
Builds an HTML-formatted list of all uploaded collateral files.  
Includes file names, links, and lead count for summary email generation.

## üîó Map Uploaded Files with Lead Data  
Matches each uploaded file with its corresponding lead using index mapping.  
Prepares structured data (Email, ProposalLink, FileName, etc.) for updating the sheet.

## ‚úÖ Update Lead Record with Proposal Link  
Updates each lead‚Äôs Google Sheet row with its proposal file link.  
Keeps all generated collateral traceable directly from the CRM.

## üìß Send Sales Summary Email via Gmail  
Delivers the AI-generated HTML report to the marketing/sales inbox.  
Subject: ‚ÄúSales Collateral Summary.‚Äù  
Automatically formatted for Gmail/Outlook rendering.

## ‚úâÔ∏è Generate Sales Summary Email (AI) Uses GPT-4o to create a **HTML-formatted sales summary email** that includes: - Total booked leads processed - List of uploaded proposal files (with links) - 2‚Äì4 sentence insights section - Professional layout (uses

,
    ,

    tags)

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
